full_summary:
## Notice of Proposed Procurement

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the procurement of led night lights for use at various Canadian Forces bases. In light of the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, bidders are strongly encouraged to submit their proposals electronically through the epost Connect service.

### Item Summary

The following led night lights are to be procured:

* Item 1 (GSIN 6220, NSN 20-009-4935): 25 units of Light, Warning, Part No. 1527541-1, NCAGE 36376, to be delivered to CFSD Montreal by February 28th, 2023.
* Item 2 (GSIN 6220, NSN 20-009-4935): 25 units of Light, Warning, Part No. 1527541-1, NCAGE 36376, to be delivered to CFSD Edmonton by February 28th, 2023.

### Procurement Details

* Public Works and Government Services Canada tender number: PW-22-01014268
* Solicitation number: W8485-227046/A
* Tender publication date: November 22, 2022
* Tender closing date: January 3, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
* Expected contract start date: None
* Expected contract end date: None
* Tender status: Expired

### Contracting Entity

* Department of National Defence
* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON, Canada, K1A 0K2

### Point of Contact

* Danny Lebel (Contracting Officer)
* Email: dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
* Note: Please use the epost Connect service for electronic submissions.

### Solicitation Documents

The bid solicitation documents are available for download:

* English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/22/f6378aca4a297dbbbbdb737a8269dd69/w8485-227046a_bid_solicitation_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/22/f6378aca4a297dbbbbdb737a8269dd69/w8485-227046a_bid_solicitation_en.pdf)
* French: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/22/7589d
